adjective.description: Giving a feeling of comfort, warmth, and relaxation.
examples: a cozy cabin tucked away in the trees

noun.description: A soft covering to keep a teapot, boiled egg, etc., hot.
examples: a photograph of Smith pouring tea from a pot with a knitted cozy
mug cozies are simple to make

verb.description: Give (someone) a feeling of comfort or complacency.
examples: she cozied him, pretending to find him irresistibly attractive

origin: Early 18th century (originally Scots): of unknown origin.
